lines: Ndaba wakwe awalo wangu, Kube kutamani.
Wakandipa kufutuka, I lwakwe mwini Jesu;
Kunyina nce ndamba cangu, Nkwendijisi nkukwakwe,
Moyo wangu, buumi bwangu, nzizyakwe kutamani.
Ndajana mweenzuma mwini, Wapegwa nguzu zyoonse,
Ndajana mweenzuma mwini, Ujisi luse lonse,
Ndapegwa inguzu zyoonse, Kuzwa ku Mwami wangu;
Nsiyandi buumi bwa nyika, Ndiwakwe kutamani.
